name: Choking Talons
description: Call forth talons from the ground, dealing 1742 Flame Damage to enemies near you and immobilizing them for 4 seconds.   Enemies hit are afflicted with Minor Maim, reducing their damage done by 5% for 10 seconds.   An ally near the talons can activate the Ignite synergy, dealing 2812 Flame Damage to all enemies held within them.
